articles.description: Embed from Getty Images QPR boss Mark Warburton believes Moses Odubajo has the attributes to play at the highest level. The former Brentford man was excellent in Rangers’ 2-1 win at Luton on Sunday. He joined Rangers on a 12-month deal following an injury-pla…
articles.content:
QPR boss Mark Warburton believes Moses Odubajo has the attributes to play at the highest level.
The former Brentford man was excellent in Rangers’ 2-1 win at Luton on Sunday.
He joined Rangers on a… [+2009 chars]

articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: Michael Conlan speaks out from the hospital after stunning knockout defeat to Leigh Wood - Daily Mail
articles.description: Michael Conlan was up on all the judges scorecards before a hard left, followed by a furious flurry from Leigh Wood sent him through the ropes to the floor in a last-round knockout defeat.
articles.content:
Michael Conlan has broken his silence after his stunning knockout defeat by Leigh Wood in their world title contest on Saturday.
The 30-year-old was up on all the judges' scorecards heading into the… [+4157 chars]
